title: Fake Post Claiming Sachin Pilot Threw Black Paint On A Modi Poster Is Back
subtitle: A photo claiming Sachin Pilot threw black paint on PM Modi's picture is back.
author: www.boomlive.in
vclaim:
Sachin Pilot, deputy chief minister of Rajasthan, threw black paint on a poster of Prime Minister Narendra Modi.

The man in photo is not Sachin Pilot but is Satyajeet Tambe, president of the Maharashtra Youth Congress. The photograph is from October 11, 2018, when Congress workers were participating in a protest against rising petrol prices.
